definition: can/may/able to/to approve/to permit/to suit/(particle used for emphasis) certainly/very
unpredictable eventuality/unpreventable/unavoidable/impossible to overcome/nothing can be done about it/act of God/force majeure
not a single one is dispensable/can't do without either
see 勢不可當|势不可当[shi4 bu4 ke3 dang1]
once it gets started there's no stopping it
pinyin: yi1 fa1 bu4 ke3 shou1 shi5

sentences.english: Solitary Beauty Peak locates in Guilin Prince City and is an integral part of the Prince City scenic area.
sentences.chinese: 獨秀峯位於桂林王城內，是王城景區不可分割的部分。

sentences.english: If there are chaos in the society, your planning cannot precede them.
sentences.chinese: 人道沒有出現禍亂的時候，不可先策劃興師。

sentences.english: This weight of evidence is something mystical and unanalyzable .
sentences.chinese: 證據的重要性是神祕不可解的。

sentences.english: Can you please open an irrevocable documentary credit?
sentences.chinese: 能開一張不可撤消的跟單信用證嗎？

sentences.english: The body of the Tathagata is adamantine and indestructible.
sentences.chinese: 如來的身體是金剛體，牢不可破。

sentences.english: Non-truth derived from the nature of truth, is inevitable.
sentences.chinese: 非真理源出於真理的本質，是不可避免的。

sentences.english: Some of the authorization roles mandate that people are assigned to them.
sentences.chinese: 一些授權角色是必不可少的，這些角色上分配了人員。

sentences.english: The distance of the braiding product is not adjustable. If necessary, the gear to be replaced shall be adjusted.
sentences.chinese: 編帶產品間距不可調，如果需要調整要更換齒輪。

sentences.english: This web siter is incredible source for around.
sentences.chinese: 這個網站是不可思議的源泉左右。

sentences.english: I've been as busy as a bee all day doing my spring - cleaning.
sentences.chinese: 大掃除使得我一整天一直忙得不可開交。
蔗糖是日常飲食中必不可少的。

sentences.english: But if I cannot get both, I would take righteousness at the cost of my life.
sentences.chinese: 二者不可得兼，捨生而取義者也。

sentences.english: But within reason, flirting is part and parcel of our daily lives.
sentences.chinese: 但當然了，調情是我們日常生活中不可分割的一部分。

sentences.english: Can we stop using the unrecyclable style of lunch boxes?
sentences.chinese: 我們能否停止使用不可回收的快餐盒？

sentences.english: I have to be in the city.
sentences.chinese: 我是非待在城市不可的人。

definition: to avoid as taboo/to avoid by all means
you must not/Please don't.../be sure not to/on no account (do it)
to be jealous of/fear/dread/scruple/to avoid or abstain from/to quit/to give up sth
abbr. for 非洲[Fei1 zhou1], Africa
to not be/not/wrong/incorrect/non-/un-/in-/to reproach or blame/(colloquial) to insist on/simply must
